snippet: President Obama’s nomination of Representative Melvin Watt to oversee the mortgage companies is a solid choice.
abstract: Editorial welcomes nomination of Rep Melvin Watt to head Federal Housing Finance Agency, regulator for government-backed mortgage companies Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac; holds Watt's experience has prepared him to protect home buyers at time when nearly one quarter of mortgages remain under water; urges Senate to give him fair chance during confirmation hearings.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s nomination of Representative Melvin Watt to oversee the mortgage companies is a solid choice.
